title: Drawing, "Design for a Rug with Circles in Squares"
medium: Pastel, graphite on white wove paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Vertical rectangle with colored boxes (two across and six down) with circles inside, in brown, turquoise, and olive green.

tombstone.epitaph:
